title.chinese: 「冬日開懷集」系列：七指雜技團《奇幻飛躍旅人》- 工作坊（一）- 深入體驗雜技技巧（加拿大）
title.english: 'Cheers!' Series: Passengers - Workshop I - Delve into the intermediate acrobatic movements by The 7 Fingers (Canada)

description.chinese: 本工作坊專為希望加深對雜技技巧的瞭解，並提高技術水平的學員而設計，工作坊會測試你的身體協調性和靈活度，學習中高程度的技巧，讓你加深對雜技的認識！參加者應具有基本的相關經驗。
description.english: Join The 7 Fingers for whom wishes to deepen their knowledge and technical level in the acrobatic discipline! The artists will test your body coordination and flexibility, and you will learn intermediate-advanced level skills to enhance your knowledge of acrobatic arts! Participants should have basic relevant experience.

presenter.chinese: 康樂及文化事務署主辦
presenter.english: Presented by Leisure and Cultural Services Department

description.chinese: 這是示例活動 2 的中文描述。
description.english: This is the English description for Sample Event 2.
